name: Blynk_Esp8266AT_WM
description: Simple WiFiManager for Blynk with MultiWiFi Credentials, for Mega, SAM DUE, SAMD21, SAMD51, nRF52, STM32, Teensy, etc. boards running ESP8266/ESP32-AT shields. Configuration data saved in EEPROM, EEPROM-emulated FlashStorage_STM32 or FlashStorage_SAMD, SAM-DUE DueFlashStorage or nRF52 LittleFS.
keywords: sensors, control, device, smartphone, mobile, app, web, cloud, communication, protocol, iot, m2m, wifi, ble, bluetooth, ethernet, usb, serial, gsm, gprs, 3g, data, esp8266, esp32, http, flashstorage, flash-storage, emulated-eeprom, wifimanager, credentials, samd, sam-due, nrf52, stm32, eeprom, littlefs, esp-at, esp8266-at, esp32-at
